content: प्रयुक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Yoked, harnessed {@--2@} Used, employed (as a word &c.); <ls>Pt. 1. 202.</ls> {@--3@} Applied. {@--4@} Appointed, nominated. {@--5@} Acted, represented. {@--6@} Arising or resulting from, produced by, consequent on; <ls>Pt. 1. 61.</ls> {@--7@} Endowed with. {@--8@} Lost in meditation, abstracted. {@--9@} Lent or put to interest (as money). {@--10@} Prompted, instigated, urged; <ls>Ku. 1. 21.</ls> {@--11@} Directed, hurled at. {@--12@} Shaken, set in motion. {@--13@} Inflicted upon. {@--14@} Connected with. {@--15@} Thick, compact, closely united. --क्तं A cause.
